verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him, and the garments, <S%H899><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and a bullock <S%H6499><s%> for the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> and a basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened bread; <S%H4682><s%>
And gather <S%H6950><s%> thou all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> together unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him; and the assembly <S%H5712><s%> was gathered together <S%H6950><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be done. <S%H6213><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and washed <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

And he put <S%H5414><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him <S%H853><s%> the coat, <S%H3801><s%> and girded <S%H2296><s%> him with the girdle, <S%H73><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him with <S%H854><s%> the robe, <S%H4598><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and he girded <S%H2296><s%> him with the curious girdle <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and bound <S%H640><s%> it unto him therewith.

And he put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him: also he put <S%H5414><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Urim <S%H224><s%> and the Thummim. <S%H8550><s%>

And he put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the miter <S%H4701><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his head; <S%H7218><s%> also upon <S%H5921><s%> the miter, <S%H4701><s%> even upon <S%H413><s%> his forefront, <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> did he put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> plate, <S%H6731><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown; <S%H5145><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was therein, and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> them.

And he sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> thereof <S%H4480><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> and anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> both the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot, <S%H3653><s%> to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.

And he poured <S%H3332><s%> of the anointing oil <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8081><s%> <S%H4888><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> head, <S%H7218><s%> and anointed <S%H4886><s%> him, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> him.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> and put coats upon <S%H3847><s%> <S%H3801><s%> them, and girded <S%H2296><s%> them with girdles, <S%H73><s%> and put <S%H2280><s%> bonnets <S%H4021><s%> upon them; as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he brought <S%H5066><s%> <S%H853><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> for the sin offering: <S%H2403><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> for the sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

And he slew <S%H7819><s%> it; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> with his finger, <S%H676><s%> and purified <S%H2398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and poured <S%H3332><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it, to make reconciliation <S%H3722><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was upon <S%H5921><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%> and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above the liver, <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and their fat, <S%H2459><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burned <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

But the bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and his hide, <S%H5785><s%> his flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and his dung, <S%H6569><s%> he burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp; <S%H4264><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> for the burnt offering: <S%H5930><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>
And he killed <S%H7819><s%> it; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>

And he cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> into pieces; <S%H5409><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burnt <S%H6999><s%> <S%H853><s%> the head, <S%H7218><s%> and the pieces, <S%H5409><s%> and the fat. <S%H6309><s%>

And he washed <S%H7364><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%> and the legs <S%H3767><s%> in water; <S%H4325><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burnt <S%H6999><s%> <S%H853><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> upon the altar: <S%H4196><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> was a burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor, <S%H7381><s%> and an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration: <S%H4394><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>

And he slew <S%H7819><s%> it; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> of it, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> the tip <S%H8571><s%> of Aaron's <S%H175><s%> right <S%H3233><s%> ear, <S%H241><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the thumb <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the great toe <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> foot. <S%H7272><s%>

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the tip <S%H8571><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> ear, <S%H241><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the thumbs <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the great toes <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> feet: <S%H7272><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fat, <S%H2459><s%> and the rump, <S%H451><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was upon <S%H5921><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%> and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above the liver, <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and their fat, <S%H2459><s%> and the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder: <S%H7785><s%>

And out of the basket <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened bread, <S%H4682><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cake, <S%H2471><s%> and a <S%H259><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> of oiled <S%H8081><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> wafer, <S%H7550><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> them on <S%H5921><s%> the fat, <S%H2459><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder: <S%H7785><s%>

And he put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> hands, <S%H3709><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> his sons' <S%H1121><s%> hands, <S%H3709><s%> and waved <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> their hands, <S%H3709><s%> and burnt <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the burnt offering: <S%H5930><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> were consecrations <S%H4394><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor: <S%H7381><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the breast, <S%H2373><s%> and waved <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for of the ram <S%H4480><s%> <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%> it was <S%H1961><s%> Moses' <S%H4872><s%> part; <S%H4490><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> of the anointing oil, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8081><s%> <S%H4888><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> his garments, <S%H899><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> his sons' <S%H1121><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him; and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H853><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and his garments, <S%H899><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> Boil <S%H1310><s%> <S%H853><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> it with the bread <S%H3899><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the basket <S%H5536><s%> of consecrations, <S%H4394><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I commanded, <S%H6680><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> it.
And that which remaineth <S%H3498><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and of the bread <S%H3899><s%> shall ye burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> of the door <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> in seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your consecration <S%H4394><s%> be at an end: <S%H4390><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall he consecrate <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> you.

As <S%H834><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> you.

Therefore shall ye abide <S%H3427><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that ye die <S%H4191><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> I am commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

So Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
